Name: Bayside
Biography: When punk rock judgment day comes, everyone knows which side of the fence BAYSIDE will be on: the legitimate one.

Name: Migos
Biography: Having grown up together in Atlanta, the members Quavo, Offset, and Takeoff first saw mainstream recognition with their 2013 single Versace.

Name: Outkast
Biography: OutKast's Organized Noize production epitomized the Atlanta wing of hip-hop's rising force, the Dirty South, during the mid to late '90s.
